original_text: The Lord let them live there safely, as he had promised to their ancestors. The Lord made them stronger than their enemies, so nobody could attack them. The Lord let them live there safely, as he had promised to their ancestors. The Lord made them stronger than their enemies, so nobody could attack them.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그들의 주위에 안식을 주셨으되 그 조상들에게 맹세하신 대로 하셨으므로 그들의 모든 원수들 중에 그들과 맞선 자가 하나도 없었으니 이는 여호와께서 그들의 모든 원수들을 그들의 손에 넘겨 주셨음이니라

sentences.original_text: The Lord let them live there safely
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 그들을 그곳에 안전하게 살게 하셨다

sentences.original_text: as he had promised to their ancestors
The Lord made them stronger than their enemies

sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 아무도 그들을 공격할 수 없었다

sentences.original_text: The Lord let them live there safely
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 그들을 그곳에 안전하게 살게 하셨다

sentences.original_text: as he had promised to their ancestors
The Lord made them stronger than their enemies

sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 아무도 그들을 공격할 수 없었다
